metadata.description:
One or more metadata key and value pairs to set or unset for the
snapshot.

To unset a metadata key value, specify only the key name.

To set a metadata key value, specify the key and value pair.

The Block Storage server does not respect case-sensitive key names.
For example, if you specify both ``"key": "v1"`` and ``"KEY":
"V1"`` , the server sets and returns only the ``KEY`` key and value
pair.
